description: Navigate to and open a specific Open Bible Story or a specific frame within the story.
variants: Open story {story_number}
Go to story {story_number} frame {frame_number}
Navigate to the current story
Take me to the next story
Show the previous story
Display frame {frame_number} from the current story
Advance to the next frame in the story
Go back to the previous frame in this story

Check assumptions in the current story
Examine implicit information in the next story

Analyze cultural context in current story
Check cultural assumptions in next story
Examine cultural implicit information in previous story
